thread.title: Brookfield Renewable Partners 2018 First Quarter Conference Call and Webcast for Investors and Analysts

author: cnbc.com
title: Brookfield Renewable Partners 2018 First Quarter Conference Call and Webcast for Investors and Analysts
text:
Date: Thursday May 3, 2018
Time: 9:00 a.m. (Eastern Time)
BROOKFIELD, News, April 10, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- You are invited to participate in Brookfield Renewable Partners’ (TSX:BEP.UN) (NYSE:BEP) 2018 First Quarter Conference Call and Webcast on Thursday, May 3, 2018 at 9:00 a.m. (Eastern Time) to discuss results and current business initiatives with members of senior management.
These results will be released on Thursday, May 3, 2018 at approximately 7:00 a.m. and will be available on our website at http://bep.brookfield.com under “Press Releases”.
To participate in the conference call, please dial 1-877-648-7976 toll-free at approximately 8:50 a.m. If calling from outside Canada or the U.S., dial 1-734-385-2616. The conference call will also be webcast live at https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1651752/82D2263D6E2C7400A8BFFB608D477D4F , where it will be archived for future reference.
For those who are unable to participate in the Conference Call, a taped rebroadcast will also be available until June 3, 2018. To access this rebroadcast, please call 1-855-859-2056 , or from outside Canada & U.S. please call 1-404-537-3406.
Brookfield Renewable Partners
Brookfield Renewable Partners operates one of the world’s largest publicly traded, pure-play renewable power platforms. Our portfolio consists of hydroelectric, wind, solar and storage facilities in North America, South America, Europe and Asia, and totals more than 16,000 megawatts of installed capacity. Brookfield Renewable is listed on the New York and Toronto stock exchanges. Further information is available at http://bep.brookfield.com . Important information may be disseminated exclusively via the website; investors should consult the site to access this information.
Brookfield Renewable is the flagship listed renewable power company of Brookfield Asset Management, a leading global alternative asset manager with over US$285 billion of assets under management.
For more information, please contact:
